description:
The newest 1071 chain features more heavily chamfered outer plates for improved shifting and quieter running.

  • PowerLock® connecting link for tool-free assembly
  • Nickel outer plate
  • Chrome-hardened hollow pins are light, strong, and extend the life of your chain
  • Recommended for Group SRAM® Force and industry standard 10 speed systems
  • 114 links
name: SRAM PC-1071 10 Speed Chain (114 Link)
